00030 CDFProbeGroupInformation::CDFProbeGroupInformation()
00031 {
00032         dataSet = 0;
00033 }
00034 
00035 CDFProbeGroupInformation::~CDFProbeGroupInformation()
00036 {
00037         if (dataSet)
00038         {
00039                 dataSet->Close();
00040                 dataSet->Delete();
00041         }
00042 }
00043 
00044 void CDFProbeGroupInformation::SetDataSet(DataSet* ds)
00045 {
00046         if (dataSet)
00047         {
00048                 dataSet->Close();
00049                 dataSet->Delete();
00050         }
00051 
00052         dataSet = ds;
00053         dataSet->Open();
00054 
00055         const DataSetHeader& dsh = ds->Header();
00056 
00057         type = Expression;
00058         direction = 0;
00059         listCnt = 0;
00060         cellCnt = 0;
00061         wobbleSituation = 0;
00062         alleleCode = 0;
00063         channel = 0;
00064         repType = 0;
00065         probeSetNumber = 0;
00066         cellsPerList = 0;
00067 
00068         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00069 
00070         // UnitType
00071         if (dsh.FindNameValParam(CDF_UNIT_TYPE, nvt))
00072                 type = (CDFDataTypeIds)nvt.GetValueUInt8();
00073         
00074         // Direction
00075         if (dsh.FindNameValParam(CDF_DIRECTION, nvt))
00076                 direction = nvt.GetValueUInt8();
00077 
00078         // ProbeSetNumber
00079         if (dsh.FindNameValParam(CDF_PROBE_SET_NUMBER, nvt))
00080                 probeSetNumber = nvt.GetValueUInt32();
00081 
00082         // CellsPerList (cells per atom)
00083         if (dsh.FindNameValParam(CDF_CELLS_PER_ATOM, nvt))
00084                 cellsPerList = nvt.GetValueUInt8();
00085 
00086         // Wobble situation 
00087 //      if (dsh.FindNameValParam(CDF_WOBBLE_SITUATION, nvt))
00088 //              wobbleSituation = nvt.GetValueUInt16();
00089 
00090         // Allele code
00091 //      if (dsh.FindNameValParam(CDF_ALLELE, nvt))
00092 //              alleleCode = nvt.GetValueUInt16();
00093 
00094         // Channel
00095 //      if (dsh.FindNameValParam(CDF_CHANNEL, nvt))
00096 //              channel = nvt.GetValueUInt8();
00097 
00098         // Probe replication type
00099 //      if (dsh.FindNameValParam(CDF_REP_TYPE, nvt))
00100 //              repType = nvt.GetValueUInt8();
00101 
00102         // List (atom)
00103         if (dsh.FindNameValParam(CDF_ATOMS, nvt))
00104                 listCnt = nvt.GetValueUInt32();
00105 
00106         // Cells
00107         if (dsh.FindNameValParam(CDF_CELLS, nvt))
00108                 cellCnt = nvt.GetValueUInt32();
00109 }
00110 
00111 /*
00112  * Get information for the probe by index
00113  */
00114 void CDFProbeGroupInformation::GetCell(int32_t cell_index, CDFProbeInformation& info)
00115 {
00116         if (cell_index < 0 || cell_index >= dataSet->Rows())
00117                 return;
00118 
00119         info.CopyFromDataSet(dataSet, cell_index);
00120 }
